verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשִּׁשִּׁ֗ית <S%H8345><s%> And it came to pass in the sixth בַּשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <S%H8345><s%> in the sixth בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> [month] in the fifth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> [as] I sat בְּבֵיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> in mine house וְזִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> and the elders יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah יוֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> sat לְפָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> before וַתִּפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> fell עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> on שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there יַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> me that the hand אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> Then I beheld וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold דְמוּת֙ <S%H1823><s%> and lo a likeness כְּמַרְאֵה־ <S%H4758><s%> as the appearance אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire מִמַּרְאֵ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> from the appearance מָתְנָ֛יו <S%H4975><s%> of his loins וּלְמַ֖טָּה <S%H4295><s%> even downward אֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire וּמִמָּתְנָ֣יו <S%H4975><s%> and from his loins וּלְמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> even upward כְּמַרְאֵה־ <S%H4758><s%> as the appearance זֹ֖הַר <S%H2096><s%> of brightness כְּעֵ֥ין <S%H5869><s%> as the colour הַחַשְׁמַֽלָה׃ <S%H2830><s%> of amber

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> And he put forth תַּבְנִ֣ית <S%H8403><s%> the form יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> of an hand וַיִּקָּחֵ֖נִי <S%H3947><s%> and took בְּצִיצִ֣ת <S%H6734><s%> me by a lock רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> of mine head וַתִּשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> lifted me up אֹתִ֣י <S%H853><s%> ר֣וּחַ ׀ <S%H7307><s%> and the spirit בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> between the earth וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between הַשָּׁמַ֡יִם <S%H8064><s%> and the heaven וַתָּבֵא֩ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֹתִ֨י <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלְַ֜מָה <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem בְּמַרְא֣וֹת <S%H4759><s%> me in the visions אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֜תַח <S%H6607><s%> to the door שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַפְּנִימִית֙ <S%H6442><s%> of the inner הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> that looketh צָפ֔וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> toward the north אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> in it מוֹשַׁ֔ב <S%H4186><s%> where [was] the seat סֵ֖מֶל <S%H5566><s%> of the image הַקִּנְאָ֥ה <S%H7068><s%> of jealousy הַמַּקְנֶֽה׃ <S%H7069><s%> which provoketh to jealousy

וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there כְּב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> And behold the glory אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּמַּרְאֶ֕ה <S%H4758><s%> [was] there according to the vision אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> that I saw בַּבִּקְעָֽה׃ <S%H1237><s%> in the plain

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> he unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man שָׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> lift up נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> now עֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> now the way צָפ֑וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> toward the north וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> So I lifted up עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way צָפ֔וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> toward the north וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold מִצָּפוֹן֙ <S%H6828><s%> and behold northward לְשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> at the gate הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar סֵ֛מֶל <S%H5566><s%> this image הַקִּנְאָ֥ה <S%H7068><s%> of jealousy הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this בַּבִּאָֽה׃ <S%H872><s%> in the entry

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> He said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> furthermore unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man הֲרֹאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> seest אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you [מֵהֵם כ] (מָ֣ה ק) (הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like ק) עֹשִׂ֑ים <S%H6213><s%> thou what they do תּוֹעֵב֨וֹת <S%H8441><s%> abominations גְּדֹל֜וֹת <S%H1419><s%> ? [even] the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> that the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ׀ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֹשִׂ֣ים <S%H6213><s%> committeth פֹּ֗ה <S%H6311><s%> here לְרָֽחֳקָה֙ <S%H7368><s%> here that I should go far off מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and מִקְדָּשִׁ֔י <S%H4720><s%> chapel וְעוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> again תָּשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> still תִּרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> thee yet again [and] thou shalt see תּוֹעֵב֖וֹת <S%H8441><s%> abominations גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1419><s%> greater ס

וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> And he brought אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> me to the door הֶֽחָצֵ֑ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court וָאֶרְאֶ֕ה <S%H7200><s%> and when I looked וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold חֹר־ <S%H2356><s%> hole אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> behold a בַּקִּֽיר׃ <S%H7023><s%> in the wall

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> he unto me Son אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man חֲתָר־ <S%H2864><s%> dig נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now בַקִּ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> now in the wall וָאֶחְתֹּ֣ר <S%H2864><s%> and when I had digged בַּקִּ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> in the wall וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> door אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> behold a

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me בֹּ֤א <S%H935><s%> unto me Go in וּרְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> and behold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתּוֹעֵב֣וֹת <S%H8441><s%> abominations הָרָע֔וֹת <S%H7451><s%> the wicked אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they עֹשִׂ֖ים <S%H6213><s%> that they do פֹּֽה׃ <S%H6311><s%> here

וָאָבוֹא֮ <S%H935><s%> So I went in וָֽאֶרְאֶה֒ <S%H7200><s%> and saw וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every תַּבְנִ֜ית <S%H8403><s%> and behold every form רֶ֤מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> of creeping things וּבְהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> beasts שֶׁ֔קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> and abominable וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גִּלּוּלֵ֖י <S%H1544><s%> and all the idols בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מְחֻקֶּ֥ה <S%H2707><s%> pourtrayed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַקִּ֖יר <S%H7023><s%> upon the wall סָבִ֥יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> round about סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> around

וְשִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> them seventy אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> of the ancients בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיַאֲזַנְיָ֨הוּ <S%H2970><s%> Jaazaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָ֜ן <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan עֹמֵ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> And there stood בְּתוֹכָם֙ <S%H8432><s%> and in the midst עֹמְדִ֣ים <S%H5975><s%> of them stood לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> with every man מִקְטַרְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4730><s%> his censer בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וַעֲתַ֥ר <S%H6282><s%> and a thick עֲנַֽן־ <S%H6051><s%> cloud הַקְּטֹ֖רֶת <S%H7004><s%> of incense עֹלֶֽה׃ <S%H5927><s%> went up

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלַי֮ <S%H413><s%> about הֲרָאִ֣יתָ <S%H7200><s%> hast thou seen בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> he unto me Son אָדָם֒ <S%H120><s%> of man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> what זִקְנֵ֤י <S%H2205><s%> what the ancients בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֹשִׂ֣ים <S%H6213><s%> do בַּחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> in the dark אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man בְּחַדְרֵ֣י <S%H2315><s%> in the chambers מַשְׂכִּית֑וֹ <S%H4906><s%> of his carved כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֹמְרִ֗ים <S%H559><s%> said אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> else יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God רֹאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> seeth אֹתָ֔נוּ <S%H853><s%> עָזַ֥ב <S%H5800><s%> hath forsaken יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> He said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Yet תָּשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> also unto me Turn תִּרְאֶ֛ה <S%H7200><s%> thee yet again [and] thou shalt see תּוֹעֵב֥וֹת <S%H8441><s%> abominations גְּדֹל֖וֹת <S%H1419><s%> greater אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they עֹשִֽׂים׃ <S%H6213><s%> that they do

וַיָּבֵ֣א <S%H935><s%> Then he brought אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward פֶּ֙תַח֙ <S%H6607><s%> me to the door שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַצָּפ֑וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> which [was] toward the north וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there הַנָּשִׁ֣ים <S%H802><s%> women יֹֽשְׁב֔וֹת <S%H3427><s%> and behold there sat מְבַכּ֖וֹת <S%H1058><s%> weeping אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתַּמּֽוּז׃ <S%H8542><s%> for Tammuz ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me הֲרָאִ֣יתָ <S%H7200><s%> he unto me Hast thou seen בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> [this] O son אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> man ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again תָּשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> still תִּרְאֶ֛ה <S%H7200><s%> thee yet again [and] thou shalt see תּוֹעֵב֥וֹת <S%H8441><s%> abominations גְּדֹל֖וֹת <S%H1419><s%> greater מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וַיָּבֵ֣א <S%H935><s%> And he brought אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about חֲצַ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> court בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S הַפְּנִימִית֒ <S%H6442><s%> me into the inner וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold פֶ֜תַח <S%H6607><s%> and behold at the door הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> of the temple יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בֵּ֤ין <S%H996><s%> between הָֽאוּלָם֙ <S%H197><s%> between the porch וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> and the altar כְּעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> [were] about five אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men אֲחֹ֨רֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H268><s%> with their backs אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הֵיכַ֤ל <S%H1964><s%> toward the temple יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H6440><s%> and their faces קֵ֔דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> toward the east וְהֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> and they מִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֥ם <S%H7812><s%> and they worshipped קֵ֖דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> toward the east לַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> the sun

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then he said אֵלַי֮ <S%H413><s%> to me הֲרָאִ֣יתָ <S%H7200><s%> unto me Hast thou seen בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> [this] O son אָדָם֒ <S%H120><s%> man הֲנָקֵל֙ <S%H7043><s%> A thing לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מֵעֲשׂ֕וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that they commit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתּוֹעֵב֖וֹת <S%H8441><s%> the abominations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָֽשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> which they commit פֹ֑ה <S%H6311><s%> here כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָלְא֨וּ <S%H4390><s%> here? for they have filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land חָמָ֗ס <S%H2555><s%> with violence וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> and have returned לְהַכְעִיסֵ֔נִי <S%H3707><s%> to provoke me to anger וְהִנָּ֛ם <S%H2005><s%> behold שֹׁלְחִ֥ים <S%H7971><s%> and lo they put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזְּמוֹרָ֖ה <S%H2156><s%> the branch אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַפָּֽם׃ <S%H639><s%> to their nose

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> indeed אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> Therefore will I also deal בְחֵמָ֔ה <S%H2534><s%> in fury לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תָח֥וֹס <S%H2347><s%> shall not spare עֵינִ֖י <S%H5869><s%> mine eye וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶחְמֹ֑ל <S%H2550><s%> neither will I have pity וְקָרְא֤וּ <S%H7121><s%> and though they cry בְאָזְנַי֙ <S%H241><s%> in mine ears ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a loud וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> [yet] will I not hear אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>
